mapper.insert: INSERT INTO memo ( member_no_login, memo_name, memo_content, memo_image, created_at ) VALUES ( #{memberNoLogin}, #{memoName}, #{memoContent}, #{memoImageFileName}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT memo_id AS id, member_no_login, memo_name, memo_content, memo_image AS memo_image_file_name, created_at FROM memo WHERE member_no_login = #{memberNoLogin} ORDER BY memo_id DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
